title: 409. Andy & DJ CTI: Two-In-One Shot, BlackRock Makes Major Change & Biden 'Is A Tyrant'
itunes:title: 409. Andy & DJ CTI: Two-In-One Shot, BlackRock Makes Major Change & Biden 'Is A Tyrant'
description: In today's episode, Andy & DJ discuss Pfizer's announcement of the two-in-one shot vaccine for COVID & the flu, BlackRock making major changes after facing a backlash against woke investing, and Republicans calling Biden's Wednesday night speech another bid to divide & distract Americans.
content:encoded: In today's episode, Andy & DJ discuss Pfizer's announcement of the two-in-one shot vaccine for COVID & the flu, BlackRock making major changes after facing a backlash against woke investing, and Republicans calling Biden's Wednesday night speech another bid to divide & distract Americans.
